review: I had fracture and shoulder related issues so went to hospital. Consultation was very nice by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. I had fallen actually. There was no waiting time when we went. X-ray was suggested and physiotherapy was suggested. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation.

\"My mother had visited the hospital and it was muscle tear issues. Consultation was fine by the doctor. We have plans to go again as we need to take injection. We are satisfied with the explanation and treatment\u00a0given. I can surely\u00a0recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. Injection was suggested last time. There was no waiting time when we went. Doctor was very friendly. \r\n\

Both knee Replacement with Robotic Technology. Done by  Dr Rahul Puri sir .
Surgery very successful. Very experienced with accurate skills.

review: I have consulted Dr. Rahul Puri for my left hand wrist fracture. I underwent k wire close surgery. The doctor has explained me the whole treatment really well and was very friendly during the recovery.
